post.desc:
I'm conflicted. 😓 Normally it would be funny to assume Sakuya would react like this to Letty's comment. But then my current impression of Sakuya is that she really has a few screws loose, and would, on the contrary, be pretty neutral in this scenario here.

Reference – [**Perfect Cherry Blossom, Sakuya Route, Stage 1**](https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/Perfect_Cherry_Blossom/Story/Sakuya%27s_Scenario#Stage_1).
